data.title: Vmo Aircraft Leasing
data.meta_description:
Vmo Aircraft Leasing | 4,705 followers on LinkedIn. Vmo Aircraft Leasing is a commercial aircraft lessor led by a team of aviation industry veterans. | Vmo Aircraft Leasing is a new commercial aircraft lessor launched in January 2021 by a team of aviation industry veterans and private equity funds managed by Ares Management Corporation.

Through its full-service platform, Vmo provides liquidity and fleet solutions to airlines, lessors and OEMs with a focus on fuel-efficient and in-demand narrow body aircraft.

The name Vmo is an aviation term indicating maximum operating velocity.
data.text:
In conjunction with #NationalEMSWeek, Vmo Aircraft Leasing’s Philanthropy Team teamed up with Vitalant to host the second Vmo Blood Drive in the Bloodmobile in front of our San Francisco office, honoring EMTs and paramedics who provide lifesaving care across the nation every day. #GiveBlood #SavingLives #community #VmoTeam You can host a blood drive with your organization or community group to make a difference for patients relying on transfusions. Learn more by visiting: vitalant.org/BloodDrive.

Members of our Dublin-based team participated in the Helping Hands Day at Barretstown. In addition to the team members’ time and energy, Vmo made a donation to support the organization. #community #VmoTeam #Ireland Barretstown: A Dublin-based charitable organization helps children and families facing serious illnesses to attend camp, providing a chance to unwind, destress, and create lasting memories together in a safe and fun environment.

Members of our Dublin-based team participated in The Jack and Jill Children's Foundation Cannonball 2023 event. In addition to the team members’ time and energy, Vmo made a donation to support the organization. #community #VmoTeam #Ireland #aviationcares The Jack and Jill Children's Foundation: An Irish nationwide charity provides in-home nursing care and respite support for children up to the age of 6 with severe to profound cognitive delay. https://lnkd.in/gaKN4Sb #CommunityMatters #JackandJill #CannonballIreland #corporatevolunteering

Vmo Aircraft Leasing successfully completed a sale and leaseback transaction for one Boeing 737 MAX 8 aircraft with Latvia-based operator SmartLynx Airlines Ltd. The aircraft was delivered to the airline in late October. #aviation #aircraftleasing #EMEA “This transaction establishes a new partnership with one of Europe’s leading ACMI operators,” commented Peter Watson, Chief Commercial Officer. “We are pleased to partner with SmartLynx on this transaction and look forward to continued growth opportunities. We thank the whole SmartLynx team for enabling us to complete the deal quickly.”

In observance of #NationalDomesticViolenceAwarenessMonth, Vmo Aircraft Leasing’s Philanthropy Team hosted a lunch conversation with Marla Hedlund from the Center for Domestic Peace (C4DP). C4DP is one of the organizations that Vmo has committed to supporting this year. You can view C4DP’s latest newsletter for more information. #mentalhealthmatters #domesticviolencesurvivor #community #Vmoteam

Vmo Aircraft Leasing is pleased to announce that in May 2023 Deirdre Ni Chearbhaill was appointed as General Counsel. Ní Chearbhaill is based in the lessor’s Dublin, Ireland, office and serves on its leadership team. #aviation #womeninaviation #aircraftleasing Robert Brown, Vmo Aircraft Leasing Executive Chairman, said: “We are delighted to welcome Deirdre to Vmo with her significant deal experience and extensive industry relationships. We look forward to her involvement in the continued development of our legal and compliance teams, as we scale up our business to further strengthen our commercial position in the global leasing market.” “I’m excited to help manage Vmo’s high transaction volume as well as to act as a strategic legal advisor to this young and ambitious company planning its future,” said Ní Chearbhaill.
